attributes.action: There should be a Public Inquiry into the handling of the Covid-19 crisis
attributes.background:
The COVID-19 pandemic was predictable and the health crisis was preventable.  The UK could have been far better prepared.

The public deserve to know what the Government knew about COVID-19, when they knew it, and what was decided by who.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
